title: [Large-Scale] Reflective Language Learning Design Workshop Using Digital Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and intermediate-level language domain knowledge
context.additional_context: Emphasis on designing language learning activities using simulation/VR in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, coupled with reflective practice experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can make decisions based on relevant research and case studies when designing language learning simulations using digital technology
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of VR-based learning activities through reflective practice and derive improvement strategies
Learners can iteratively improve language learning designs based on peer feedback and transform them into shareable knowledge assets.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
